metadata.title: CVE-2014-9894 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: drivers/misc/qseecom.c in the Qualcomm components in Android before2016-08-05 on Nexus 7 (2013) devices does not ensure that certain namestrings end in a '\0' character, which allows attackers to obtain sensitiveinformation via a crafted application, aka Android internal bug 28749708and Qualcomm internal bug CR545736.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
